                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    An Average Day for a Principal Engineer<\/strong><\/h3>\n
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 10:00-10:15 Quick team stand-up, one of your team members seem to be working on a problem you worked on before, and offer to pair with them after the stand-up to support<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 10:30-14:00 Pairing with one of your team members to work on a complex scalability issue together and grabbing a quick bite to re-fuel those pesky braincells in-between coding sessions!<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 14:00-15:00 Doing a design session with the Product Manager and UX designer for a large upcoming feature that the team should pick up next week. You ask a lot of questions to drill down to the problem we are trying to solve, and suggest some easier solutions that require less effort for the team.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 15:00-16:00 The design session triggered some thoughts about other areas of the system that will be affected. You\u00e2\u0080\u0099re doing a quick dive in the affected areas of the code and find some technical debt that might affect the system\u00e2\u0080\u0099s scalability or reliability. You create a brief Jira ticket and tag the Product Manager to help get it prioritised and to ensure it is not forgotten. You also ping the ticket to one of the other domains' tech leads, as you recall them mentioning a similar problem existing in another domain team.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 16:00-16:30 Quick catch-up with the Engineering Manager on the teams delivery reliability and how you can help keep Work in Progress (WIP) and Pull Request (PR) review time to a minimum<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • 16:30-18:00 Talking about PR\u00e2\u0080\u0099s, there are actually still a few open. You take the last part of the day to review your teams PRs. There are some great solutions offered, but one of the junior engineers introduced some code that is difficult to maintain and is lacking unit tests. You jump on a quick call with them to explain the issues and why it matters.<\/li><\/ul>\n

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An Average Day for a Principal Engineer<\/strong><\/h3>\n
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 10:00-10:15 Quick team stand-up, one of your team members seem to be working on a problem you worked on before, and offer to pair with them after the stand-up to support<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 10:30-14:00 Pairing with one of your team members to work on a complex scalability issue together and grabbing a quick bite to re-fuel those pesky braincells in-between coding sessions!<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 14:00-15:00 Doing a design session with the Product Manager and UX designer for a large upcoming feature that the team should pick up next week. You ask a lot of questions to drill down to the problem we are trying to solve, and suggest some easier solutions that require less effort for the team.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 15:00-16:00 The design session triggered some thoughts about other areas of the system that will be affected. You\u00e2\u0080\u0099re doing a quick dive in the affected areas of the code and find some technical debt that might affect the system\u00e2\u0080\u0099s scalability or reliability. You create a brief Jira ticket and tag the Product Manager to help get it prioritised and to ensure it is not forgotten. You also ping the ticket to one of the other domains' tech leads, as you recall them mentioning a similar problem existing in another domain team.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 16:00-16:30 Quick catch-up with the Engineering Manager on the teams delivery reliability and how you can help keep Work in Progress (WIP) and Pull Request (PR) review time to a minimum<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • 16:30-18:00 Talking about PR\u00e2\u0080\u0099s, there are actually still a few open. You take the last part of the day to review your teams PRs. There are some great solutions offered, but one of the junior engineers introduced some code that is difficult to maintain and is lacking unit tests. You jump on a quick call with them to explain the issues and why it matters.<\/li><\/ul>\n

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Company description<\/h1>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  At DeSci Labs<\/a>, we\u00e2\u0080\u0099re on a mission to rebuild scientific publishing from the ground up. We believe the future of science is open, transparent, and decentralized. That\u00e2\u0080\u0099s why we\u00e2\u0080\u0099re developing the open-source infrastructure that will accelerate scientific progress\u00e2\u0080\u0094powered by Web3 and AI.<\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Founded in Switzerland in 2021 by scientists and engineers, DeSci Labs was the first to build a fully open-access scientific publishing platform on Web3: DeSci Publish. To date, we\u00e2\u0080\u0099ve raised over $6.5 million in funding and are preparing for an upcoming token launch designed to shift ownership of scientific infrastructure to the global research community.<\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  What We\u00e2\u0080\u0099re Building<\/h2>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • DeSci Publish<\/a>: A revolutionary preprint network where manuscripts, data, and code coexist. It offers AI-powered analytics, version control, validated badges, and automatic submission tools\u00e2\u0080\u0094eliminating paywalls and publication fees.<\/p><\/li>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • CODEX<\/a> (Collaborative Data Exchange): An open scholarly protocol designed to create a persistent, collaborative scientific record. It ensures research artifacts are securely stored, universally accessible, and transparently validated.<\/p><\/li>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Web3 Incentives: <\/strong>A token economy that rewards authors, journals, and reviewers for high-quality contributions, redistributing wealth from commercial publishers to the scientists who advance the creation of knowledge.<\/p><\/li><\/ul>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Design at Pennylane<\/b><\/p>


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Design sits at the center of this mission and its purpose is to deliver a seamless, accessible and enjoyable experience for our users. Our team of 20+ product designers work across different tracks that are divided into cross-functional squads each consisting of Engineering, Product and Design. Autonomy, trust and transparency are the key values upon which our culture is built, this is directly reflected in how our designers operate on a day-to-day basis. At Pennylane, designers are expected to actively contribute all the way from defining the problem space, to research and testing.<\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    About Altan<\/b><\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    We started out as a data team ourselves and worked across large-scale data projects for 200 organizations, including the United Nations' SDGs National Data Platforms<\/b><\/a>.<\/p>


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Today, Atlan is the next-generation platform for data and AI governance. It is a control plane that stitches together a business's disparate data infrastructure, cataloging data and enriching it with business context and security.<\/p>


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Data practitioners spend 30-50% of their time finding and understanding data; Atlan's platform cuts that time by 95% and sets a new standard for modern data governance and AI readiness. With Atlan, data and business teams can easily find, trust, and govern AI-ready data.<\/p>


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Backed by top investors including GIC, Insight Partners, Sequoia Capital India, and Salesforce Ventures, Atlan features deep integrations across the modern data stack and is trusted by the likes of Cisco, Autodesk, Unilever, Ralph Lauren, FOX, News Corp, Nasdaq, NextGen, Plaid, and HubSpot to enable major AI and data democratization initiatives.<\/p>


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <\/p>Application Process<\/b>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Online Application: Candidates MUST apply through our careers page.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Applications Open: 21st February 2025.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Applications Close: 7th March 2025.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Application Review: Our team will assess your application to determine if you're a good fit.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Online Test: A test link will be shared with shortlisted candidates after the application review.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Take-Home Challenge: Based on your test performance, you'll work on a take-home task designed to evaluate your problem-solving abilities and creativity.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Interview: Engage in a comprehensive interview to explore your fit with our culture, values, and the role. You'll be informed in real time when your interview is scheduled.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Offer: Receive the internship offer.<\/li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Internship Start Date: 2nd June 2025.<\/li><\/ul>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        About Us:<\/strong><\/p>\n

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        BlackSky is a real-time intelligence company. We own and operate the world's most advanced space-based intelligence platform and provide customers satellite imagery, automated analytics and high-frequency monitoring of strategic locations, economic assets and events from around the globe. BlackSky is trusted by the most demanding allied military and intelligence organizations and commercial companies to deliver foresight into critical matters that affect national security and the economy. BlackSky's data enables governments and businesses to see, understand and anticipate change as it happens, giving them the ultimate strategic advantage so they can act quickly. Our global team works with cutting-edge technology to make a difference around the world and prides itself on being people-first, customer-focused and fun.<\/p>\n

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        BlackSky is looking for a talented system architect, in support of the Chief Technology Office to help shape and drive the direction and realization of future BlackSky space and ground system capabilities. This role will play an instrumental part in future innovation and supporting BlackSky\u00e2\u0080\u0099s position as a leader in real-time geospatial intelligence. BlackSky is looking for multi-faceted individuals with a strong engineering background who can work across diverse stakeholder sets to develop and guide solutions for challenging problems and complex customer missions. This is a hands-on role and you will be working across teams to evolve our current systems and technologies to align with future BlackSky requirements, capabilities, and strategic direction. <\/p>\n

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        This role reports to the VP, Product Architecture and while we would strongly prefer candidates near either our Herndon, VA office we may also consider remote candidates in certain states.<\/p>\n

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Why This Role is Important to Arcadia<\/b><\/p>


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        At <\/span>Arcadia.io<\/a>, The Customer Success Analyst (CSA) has complete responsibility for the management of steady state activities for all of Arcadia\u00e2\u0080\u0099s non-enterprise clients. CSAs commit to the ongoing work of making satisfied customers, through ensuring strong data quality, rapid and effective support, and smooth upgrades. The CSA displays an intimate understanding of Arcadia functionality and can marry this understanding with their knowledge of value-based care to lead product trainings, mitigate issues, and reconfigure tools to meet new business goals.<\/span><\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         <\/span><\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        CSAs have a knack for troubleshooting complex technical issues, enjoy getting into the weeds, and excel at critical problem solving. As the customer\u00e2\u0080\u0099s primary point of contact, the CSA will prioritize post-implementation scope, communicate timelines, and manage delivery.<\/span><\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         <\/span><\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In this position, you will be a member of the Customer Success Management team within Arcadia\u00e2\u0080\u0099s Customer Management division. You will work closely with implementation management, production support SMEs, engineering, and account management.<\/span><\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                About Arcadia<\/b><\/p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Arcadia.io<\/a> helps innovative providers and payers across the country transform healthcare to reduce cost while improving patient health. We do this by aggregating large amounts of disparate data, applying algorithms to identify opportunities to provide better patient care, and making those opportunities actionable by physicians at the point of care in near-real time. We are passionate about helping our customers drive meaningful outcomes. We are growing fast and have emerged as a market leader in the highly competitive population health management software market and have been recognized by industry analysts KLAS, IDC, Forrester, and Chilmark for our leadership. For a better sense of our brand and products, please explore our website<\/a>.<\/p>
